extendedInfo.description: The Kids school (Tamil Version - 3) app consists of Tamil to english translator categories like parts of the body, colors, vegetables, numbers to learn and play with them. There are over hundred words to teach your kids. There is even a quiz game, memory game, match game to train and monitor your kids. Teach them, Learn and play with them. Make the best time for them. Kids will love going to schools later.Give your kids an experience of a school goer while @ home. Have some fun and valuable time with your kids.Support both smartphones and tablets.Keywords: The kids school, Kids, School, Educational, Games, Preschool, Child, english, Translator, Learn, Teach, Quiz, Games, Monitor, Love, Children,   School, Kindergarten, fun, Preschool-aged, Skills, Relationships, Transports, Feelings, english alphabets, kids english, play, hindi, learn hindi, Fruits, parts of the body, colors, vegetables, numbers.

reviews.comment: Out of the 3 Tamil apps this is the only one that hasn\'t crashed but played consistently which is great as our almost 1yr old love\'s it....
reviews.author: Titlii Chellappa
